title: Protein Tracker
description: Lose weight,bulk up, or maintain a healthy lifestyle by tracking your caloric intake quickly and easily.

title: Face-Recognition
description: This Magic Brain will detect faces in your pictures.
p: Whether you have one photo or more, you are only steps away from using artificial intelligence to recognize the face in your photo.

title: Live Currency
description: This site is an exercise. The data displayed here is not to be considered a model of reference.
p: Today's exchange rates from throughout the world. Select your currency and we'll show you how it's faring against other currencies throughout the world.
p2: With our free Currency Converter tool, you can convert any amount of money from one foreign currency to another with one click of a button.
p3: Created with the help of: React, Redux, Axios, React-world-flags, Validator, Styled-components & more

title: PostgreSQL-CRUD
description: CREATE - READ - UPDATE - DELETE with PostgreSQL

title: Pagination
description: Two different pagination examples with data from JSONPlaceholder & The Movie Database.
p: The JSONPlaceholder is a simple example of pagination and The Movie Database is a more complex one.

title: Monster
p: Just search for a monster name, nothing more nothing less.
